narration:
"Okay, let's talk about getting support with your career and job search. You know how important it is to have a plan in place for after you graduate? Well, there are people on campus who can help you make that happen.

The Careers & Employability Service is here to provide you with guidance and resources to achieve your career goals. They've got a wealth of information on their website, which I'll share with you now. (points to the URL) You can find it at lit.ie/careers-employability.

This service offers a range of support, from CV building and interview preparation to job searching and networking opportunities. They also have partnerships with employers, so they can help connect you with potential job openings that match your skills and interests.

One of the best things about this service is that it's free for all students. Yes, you read that right – completely free! So, take advantage of this amazing resource to get ahead in your career. Whether you're looking to start a new business or land your dream job, they can help you every step of the way.

Make sure to check out their website regularly for updates on events, workshops, and online resources. And don't be afraid to reach out to them directly if you need one-on-one advice or guidance. They're here to support you in achieving your career aspirations."
